page.title: 18FOOD IN STOW
page.content: There are plenty of restaurants in Stow and pubs where you can eat, but it is too expensive for most people to do very often. Quite a lot of people use the fish and chip shop in Park Street. Over the last few years more homes have got deep-freezes and this makes it easy to have all sorts of different and easy foods. Now micro-wave cookers are making life even easier. Foreign holidays have given people a lot of different ideas for food like pasta. Even school meals are changing. Most of the food comes ready prepared, even the vegetables. A typical meal is sausage roll, spaghetti and mashed potatoes with a yoghurt or cheese and biscuits to follow.
